items.title: These AI notetaking devices can help you record and transcribe your meetings
items.description: These physical notetakers transcribe audio and give users summaries and action items of meetings using AI. Some even offer live translation.

items.title: TikTok says its services are restored after the outage
items.description: TikTok says it finally solved all issues related to outages caused by last week's U.S. snowstorm.

items.title: AI layoffs or ‘AI-washing’?
items.description: How many of the companies with recent layoffs are just using AI as an excuse?

items.title: Why Tether’s CEO is everywhere right now
items.description: For years, Tether's CEO avoided the United States, watching from offshore as regulators circled and prosecutors investigated. Those days are over.

items.title: Amazon’s ‘Melania’ documentary makes $7M on opening weekend
items.description: While the documentary is exceeding box office expectations, it's unlikely to make a profit in theaters.
